title: Shocked motorists spot two children sitting in a toy car on top of an SUV
text:
Motorists on a busy road were stunned to see two children sitting in a toy car tied to the roof of a moving SUV.

Footage shows the two children in the electric car which is almost a replica of the White Ford Escape carrying it along a Mexican city street.

The shocking scenes were recorded in Zapopan, in the western Mexican state of Jalisco by motorists on a rainy day.

A motorist who was driving on the busy road spotted the shocking scene and filmed it

In the video, the white SUV can be seen being driven with a toy car fixed to its roof.

The driver then spots the bigger of the two children before a voice in the background can be heard saying: 'There are two of them.'

As the camera zooms in, the older child can be seen with his arm around the younger one, both of them wearing hoods against the rain.

As the camera zooms in, the older child can be seen with his arm around the younger one

Authorities said no arrests have been made so far but they will act against the driver of the SUV

The Department of Communications of the Public Security Secretary of the State of Jalisco told local media that they will act against the driver of the vehicle carrying the kids.

So far, no arrests have been made.

Internet users were shocked at the video, with one person commenting: 'Such irresponsible parents, and the authorities are not acting before the kids could suffer a traffic accident.'

Another user wrote: 'I would have stopped in front of the car, taken the kids down and called the police.'
description: The footage was recorded in the municipality of Zapopan, in the western Mexican state of Jalisco by stunned motorists. The older child can be seen with his arm around the younger one.
